page.title: 09 TRADE
page.content: Cannock centres upon Market Place from which all roads radiate to all points of the compass. With its flowers and trees is one of the brightest centres in the area. There is an attractive indoor market which is open on Tuesday,Friday and Saturday. A new precinct in Market Hall street contains an International Superstore, and a Co-op,a number of fashion boutiques for men and women,a travel agent and an arcade. In the residential areas there are well established shopping centres such as Chadsmoor and Blackfords,not only meeting day to day needs but often including more specialist shops. Of people surveyed,most prefered to shop locally.
